subject: Where is my order
description_text:
Morning!
Where is my order? I ordered the Vam pro motors on the 25th of December 2025 I paid for the 3-5day delivery, its now the 13 Jan 2026 and I still do not have my order. Im starting to get very annoyed with the service and ive paid alot of money to your company for your product and haven't recieved it. Please i form me of the where abouts my order is. My order number is SSN5264 
Regards
Ryan Clarke

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Ryan Clarke,     We apologize for the delay. Your order has been shipped. Below is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047201468607

Morning
What about the extra I paid for quick delivery? If you are unable to make deliveries within that time frame you should not be having customers pay extra for it. 
Regards
Ryan clarke

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer
Hi Ryan Clarke,     If you incur any additional shipping charges, we will refund them to you later.
